tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ResearchData (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    cell_type_id INT,
    research_date DATE,
    research_result TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (cell_type_id) REFERENCES StemCellTypes(id)
);

CREATE TABLE research_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    research_id INT,
    researcher_id INT,
    result_date DATE,
    result_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE research_results (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    cell_type_id INT,
    effectiveness DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
    researcher VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    date_conducted DATE
);
